document.ModsDocTitle: Taxonomic study of the Pinelemabailongensis species group with descriptions of six new species from China (Araneae, Telemidae)
document.docAuthor: Zhao, Huifeng, Yao, Zhiyuan, Song, Yang & Li, Shuqiang
document.docTitle: Pinelema lizhuang Zhao & Li, sp. n.
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic study of the Pinelemabailongensis species group with descriptions of six new species from China (Araneae, Telemidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic study of the Pinelemabailongensis species group with descriptions of six new species from China (Araneae, Telemidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Pinelema lizhuang Zhao & Li sp. n. Figs 12, 13, 14, 31

Holotype ♂ (IZCAS): China, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, Hechi Prefecture, Nandan County, Liuzai Town, Lizhuang Village, Cave without a name, 25°18.490 'N , 107°22.910'E , 828 m, 28.I.2015, Y. Li and Z. Chen leg. Paratypes (IZCAS): 5♂ and 5♀, same data as holotype.
4♀ (molecular vouchers, IZCAS), same data as holotype.
The species epithet refers to the type locality; noun.

This species resembles P. wenyang Zhao & Li, sp. n. (Figs 21-23) but can be distinguished by following characters: bulb curved dorso-medially (Figure 13D) (bulb curved dorso-subdistally in P. wenyang Zhao & Li, sp. n.), larger Esl/El ratio (0.63-0.67, n = 6, mean = 0.65, Suppl. material 1: Figure S6) (smaller Esl/El ratio 0.51-0.55, n = 5, mean = 0.53 in P. wenyang Zhao & Li, sp. n.), and smaller El/Bl ratio (1.24-1.31, n = 6, mean: 1.27, Suppl. material 1: Figure S6) (larger El/Bl ratio 1.47-1.54, n = 5, mean: 1.49 in P. wenyang Zhao & Li, sp. n.).

caption.paragraph: Figure 12. Pinelema lizhuang Zhao & Li, sp. n., male. A Palp, prolateral view B Palp, retrolateral view C Embolus, prolateral view D Embolus, retrolateral view. Scale bars: 0.1 mm ( A-B ), 0.05 mm ( C-D ).

Figure 13. Pinelema lizhuang Zhao & Li, sp. n., male holotype. A Habitus, dorsal view B Embolus, apical view C Palp, prolateral view D Palp, retrolateral view. Scale bars: 0.2 mm (A), 0.05 mm (B), 0.1 mm ( C-D ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Male (holotype): Total length 1.20. Carapace 0.50 long, 0.51 wide. Abdomen 0.67 long, 0.56 wide. Carapace pale brown (Figure 13A). Six eyes ringed with black (Figure 13A), clypeus height 0.11, ocular quadrangle 0.15 wide. Chelicerae, legs, labium, and endites light yellow with dark brown dots. Sternum dark brown with sparse setae. Leg measurements: I 3.83 (1.13, 0.19, 1.18, 0.78, 0.55); II 3.15 (0.92, 0.19, 0.96, 0.59, 0.49); III 2.29 (0.67, 0.16, 0.63, 0.43, 0.40); IV 2.36 (0.87, 0.18, 0.78, 0.53, 0.42). Abdomen purple-bluish (Figure 13A).

Palp: Tibia 2.9 times longer than patella, cymbium 2.0 times longer than tibia, cymbial apophysis cone-shaped (Figure 13C); bulb hemispherical (Figure 13C, D); spiral ridge brown (Figure 13B), El/Bl ratio 1.26 (Figure 13D), the distal part of embolus black (Figure 13C, D), and Esl/El ratio 0.65 (Figure 13D).

caption.paragraph: Figure 14. Pinelema lizhuang Zhao & Li, sp. n., female paratype. A Habitus, dorsal view B Habitus, ventral view C Endogyne, lateral view. Scale bars: 0.2 mm ( A-B ), 0.05 mm (C).

subSubSection.paragraph: In 5♂ paratypes: El/Bl ratio 1.24-1.31, Esl/El ratio 0.63-0.67.
China (Guangxi, Figure 31), known only from the type locality.
